name: Dead Dock Protocol
storyline:
My name is General Geoff Deadright, and you have been selected because of your unique set of skills to combat the ever-growing threat of the D0K or “dock” chip zombie robot outbreak.

As you know, the invention of the D0K chip was to make life easier and start the next evolution of the partnership between man and machine. What we didn’t plan for, was that the dang blasted AI built into the first prototype would become self-aware and deem the human race unfit to continue and unleash a zom-bot outbreak on humanity.

Your mission is to locate and capture the known rogue D0K chip, or as we call it Alpha Dock and its infected offspring Beta Dock, Gamma Dock, Delta Dock, Epsilon Dock, Sigma Dock, and Zeta Dock.

You will be provided the most advanced Operations and Recon Protocol Armor Series 8 Revision X, or “0rp8x” Armor with the newest prototype D0K-X chip to help in your forthcoming battle. As you complete each mission, we can use the data stored in the rogue D0X chip to upgrade your weapons armor with new abilities.

You are humanity's last hope To defeat the zom-bot outbreak! Now get out there soldier and save the human world!
summary:
A neon-bloody action cyberpunk zombie shooter from Game Studio 1979.

Introducing Dead Dock Protocol, a thrilling cyberpunk zombie shooter packed with intense, neon-blood-soaked action! Embark on a crucial mission to rescue six besieged city zones from the clutches of Zombots and their formidable bosses. Whether you fight alongside your team or venture alone, your objective is to stay alive and eradicate the hordes of Zombots.
